front.title: A list of possible SPIRITS functions

abstract.t: This Internet Draft has been written at the request of one of the SPIRITS Working Group co-chairs in order to elicit discussion on what extended functionality SPIRITS may be used to provide. It has been requested that mapping to any specific protocol is not undertaken at this juncture. As such, only 'possible' functionality is identified and no mapping to existing protocol methods is given. This document is only intended to provide a basis for discussion and would be expected to form one aspect of the requirements for SPIRITS. As such the terminology used is deliberately and (we hope) suitably ambiguous.
